dmca.title: Copyright Infringement [ThePlanetAbuse-C3884553W]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, April 25, 2007 5:51 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: Copyright Infringement [ThePlanetAbuse-C3884553W]

This message was received concerns a matter from a source deemed
important enough for auto-forwarding. It is being forwarded to you for
review and applicable action.

Abuse Department
The Planet


=====================
Original Message
=====================
X-MailFrom: copyright@jagex.com
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net
Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Wed Apr 25 10:50:03 2007
Received: (qmail 16262 invoked by alias); 25 Apr 2007 15:50:03 -0000
Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net
Received: (qmail 16259 invoked from network); 25 Apr 2007 15:50:03 -0000
Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com (70.87.6.110)
  by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 25 Apr 2007 15:50:03 -0000
Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by
smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830);
         Wed, 25 Apr 2007 10:50:02 -0500
Return-path: <copyright@jagex.com>
Delivery-date: Wed, 25 Apr 2007 10:50:02 -0500
Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181]
helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com)
        by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from copyright@jagex.com)
        with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)
        (Exim)
        id 1Hgjko-0005bH-KW
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 25 Apr 2007 10:50:02 -0500
Received: from mail.jagex.com ([212.44.19.197])
        by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from copyright@jagex.com)
        with esmtps (TLSv1:AES256-SHA:256)
        (Exim)
        id 1Hgjkn-0009zE-27
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 25 Apr 2007 10:50:01 -0500
Received: from [146.101.150.31] (helo=jagex.com)
        by mail.jagex.com with smtp (Exim 4.50)
        id 1Hgjkh-0005Fk-HH
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 25 Apr 2007 16:49:55 +0100
User-Agent: Jagex-Email-Sender
From: Jagex Copyright Team <copyright@jagex.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright Infringement
Message-Id: <E1Hgjkh-0005Fk-HH@mail.jagex.com>
Date: Wed, 25 Apr 2007 16:49:55 +0100
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 25 Apr 2007 15:50:02.0903 (UTC)
FILETIME=[63283A70:01C78751]

To whom it may concern,

I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that I am the owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the intellectual property
rights. I have a good faith belief that the use of the material
identified below has not been authorised by the owner, its agents or the
law. Please promptly remove the infringing material or disable access to
it.

Name of the Intellectual Property Owner: Jagex Limited, UK registered
company number 03982706.

Name and/or Description of the Infringed Work or Right: Various artwork
belonging to Jagex Ltd as shown on our website, http://www.runescape.com
as well as several references to the Runescape name, copyright of Jagex
Ltd. 2007

Description of the Infringing Material: Various images including the
Runescape logo and screen shots from the Runescape game. These images
can be found on our website at http://www.runescape.com

Location of the Infringing Material:

http://gcoolgame.com/

The site is using copyright images from our game and claims to give
players access to cheats within the game which in fact do not exist. The
page will harvest player passwords so that the user of the site can go
ahead and access other players' accounts within the game.

I would appreciate someone looking at this site for me, and a possible
reply.

Date: 25-Apr-2007

I can be contacted at:

Name: Matthew Partridge
Email: copyright@jagex.com

I certify under penalty of perjury the truth of the above information.

Regards,

Matthew Partridge
Jagex Ltd.

-- 

IMPORTANT NOTICE

The sender does not guarantee that this message, including any
attachment, is secure or virus free. Also, it is confidential and may be
privileged or otherwise protected from disclosure. If you are not the
intended recipient, do not disclose or copy it or its contents. Please
telephone or email the sender and delete the message entirely from your
system.
Jagex Limited is a company registered in England & Wales with company
number 03982706 and a registered office at St. Andrews House, 90 St.
Andrews Road, Cambridge, CB4 1DL, UK.
